text: Dalmatia is a region of the Balkan Peninsula along the Adriatic Sea. It mostly belongs to Croatia. It goes from the island of Pag in the northwest to the Bay of Kotor (in Montenegro) in the southeast. ==Related pages== *Dalmatian Italians *Istrian-Dalmatian exodus *Italian language in Croatia *Italian cultural and historic presence in Dalmatia *List of Italian place names in Dalmatia *Venice and Dalmatia == References ==
title: Dalmatia
